author: Andrej-CMS
body:
Dear all,

this PR introduces Herwig 7.1.1, ThePEG 2.1.1. as well as a MG5aMCatNLO patch to make the interface between ME generators work in CMSSW . This is an further development of PR #2889 . Please see the discussion on externals there.

Herwig7.1.1 brings matching and merging to the Herwig7 framework. With the version in this PR the following combinations of generators work:

- Herwig 7.1.1. +Openloops
- Powheg ME implementation in Herwig 7.1.1
- Showering of LHE files (Tested with PowhegV2 LHE files ) 
- Herwig 7.1.1+MG5aMC@NLO 2.5.5
- Herwig 7.1.1+Madgraph+GoSam
- Herwig 7.1.1+Madgraph+Openloops

Kind regards,

Andrej
title: Herwig 7.1.1 with External NLO Matrix Element Providers
